score: 2 out of 2 people found the following review useful
review: Shrek is one of the few children's movies that I've seen that is equally effective at entertaining adults.  If my kids want to watch a movie, odds are I'll try to talk them into this one.  It was good enough that I'm glad I have kids so I have an excuse to see part 2 in the theaters.
